taskbody.context: To install using the Windows installer:

step.cmd: Make sure that your system meets the system requirements listed above.
Download the installation kit and run it.
Follow the instructions presented in the installation program.
Copy to clipboard the license key you have received by email and paste it in the license dialog.

result.p: The user preferences are stored in the com.oxygenxmlcom.oxygenxml.authorcom.oxygenxml.developer com.syncrosvnclient subfolder of the folder that is the value of the APPDATA Windows variable for the user that starts the application.
